Stop-loss strategy: **Sell when EPS drops below 3 or ROE falls below 10%**
Sell when the stock price drops by 15% from the current price or when the EPS turns negative.
Close price falls below 23 NTD, or EPS drops by more than 20% in two consecutive years.
